comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: French ambassador to the United States, he spoke at the dedication of the equestrian statue of Joan of Arc in Riverside Park, New York, December 6, 1915.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Jean Adrien Antoine Jules Jusserand (18 February 1855 – 18 July 1932) was a French author and diplomat. He was the French ambassador to the United States during World War I. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Jules_Jusserand

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan and Richard Arthur Norton: Thank you for your comments.  We will include some of your information next time we update the record.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Note that Jusserand is wearing half-mittens, that give his palms some warmth while allowing his thumbs and fingers room to maneuver.
